Reno.Club Cal Neva:
Club Cal Neva is a casino and former hotel located in Downtown Reno, Nevada.
The 36,454 square feet (3,386.7 m2) casino has 849 slot machines, 41 table games, 3 poker tables and a race and sports book.


== History ==

Club Cal Neva is one of the most historic casinos in Northern Nevada, having held its presence in Downtown Reno through all of its monumental changes over the years.
